contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Odessa}} '''[[Odessa]]''' is the fourth largest city in Ukraine. '''Odessa''' may also refer to: {{tocright}} ==Places== === Ukraine === * [[Nova Odesa]] === Brazil === * [[Nova Odessa]] === Canada === * [[Odessa, Ontario]] * [[Odessa, Saskatchewan]] === United States === * [[Odessa, California]] * [[Odessa, Delaware]] * [[Odessa, Florida]] * [[Odessa, Minnesota]] * [[Odessa, Missouri]] * [[Odessa, Nebraska]] * [[Odessa, New York]] * [[Odessa, Oregon]] * [[Odessa, Texas]], the largest American city with this name * [[Odessa, Washington]] *[[Odessa, West Virginia]] {{see also|Odessa Township (disambiguation)|Lake Odessa}} ==Other uses== * [[ODESSA]], an organization of former members of the Nazi SS (''Organisation Der Ehemaligen SS-AngehÃ¶rigen'') * [[Odessa (Bee Gees album)|''Odessa'' (Bee Gees album)]], 1969 * [[Odessa (The Handsome Family album)|''Odessa'' (The Handsome Family album)]], 1994 * [[Odessa (band)]], a Scottish synth pop band * [[Odessa (Encantadia)]], a character in the fantasy series ''Etheria'' * Typhoon Odessa, of the [[Typhoon Odessa (1985)|1985 Pacific typhoon season]] * [[Odessa Cubbage]], a minor character in the game ''Half-Life 2'' * [[Odessa (Wild ARMs 2)]], a fictional terrorist organization from the PlayStation role-playing game Wild ARMs 2 * "Odessa", a song by the Luxembourgian neo-folk act [[Rome (band)|Rome]] from their 2009 album ''Flowers From Exile'' * "Odessa", a song by the Canadian electronic musician Caribou from his 2010 album ''[[Swim (Caribou album)|Swim]]'' * "Odessa", a song by Animals as Leaders from their 2011 album ''[[Weightless (Animals as Leaders album)|Weightless]]'' ==See also== * [[Edessa (disambiguation)]] * [[Odessa Mama (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
